articles.content: Breast cancer is one of the most prevalent and fatal forms of cancer. Government data shows that, on average, nearly four out of ten women diagnosed with breast cancer succumbed to the disease in Ind… [+5254 chars]

articles.title: Mizoram reports first case of Japanese Encephalitis - Northeast Now
articles.description: Mizoram on Thursday reported its first case of Japanese Japanese Encephalitis (JE), that's spread through mosquito bites.
articles.content:
AIZAWL:  Mizoram on Thursday reported its first case of Japanese Encephalitis (JE), a viral brain infection that’s spread through mosquito bites.
